title: "Harmonizing the Principles: A Journey to Present Awareness"
first_phrase: In the previous section, the author discusses the concept of "right reasoning" to reach a state of well-being in the present. This involves freeing oneself from conditioned thoughts and limitations to become fully active and present. In the last 200 tokens, the author delves into the symbolic interpretation of reasoning as a spiritual principle, and the process of transformation towards presence through a spiral of harmony. The importance of the vertical axis and the present moment is highlighted, where time loses importance. The text concludes by emphasizing the need to dissolve compulsions and return to presence for true harmony.
content: Tutto il percorso di trasformazione deve essere riferito ad un percorso verso la presenza che può essere immaginato come una spirale che si innalza e diventa sempre più aderente al principio centrale. Quindi di volta in volta dobbiamo “sciogliere” le nostre compulsioni nella nostra globalità ? e tornare ogni volta alla PRESENZA. Solo questo permette di armonizzare i principi. last_phrase: In conclusion, to achieve harmony between the vertical and manifestational principles, we must constantly dissolve our compulsions and return to the present moment, which is the central point around which we revolve. By being master of our senses and transcending ego-driven attitudes and energies, we can access the extratemporal center and alter our perception of time, enabling us to reach our goal of being present in the moment.
